short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING. Extension to manage your EVM and Pocket wallets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Soothe Vault: Your Ultimate Multi-Blockchain Wallet

A secure, user-friendly wallet and gateway to blockchain sites
Whether you are a seasoned blockchain user or new to the technology, Soothe Vault helps you seamlessly connect to multiple blockchains, including Pocket (POKT).
Trusted by many, our mission is to make blockchain interactions accessible to all.
The Soothe Vault extension enables you to manage, store, and interact with EVM and Pocket wallets securely.

With Soothe Vault, your keys and assets remain in your control:
• Securely manage your digital assets with high-grade encryption.
• Synchronize and navigate multiple blockchain wallets effortlessly.
• Browse and connect to decentralized websites.
• Control the information you share and maintain your privacy.

If you’re an existing user, you can import your current wallets. New users will find getting started easy with our intuitive interface.
Because Soothe Vault adds functionality to your browser, we require permission to read and write to any webpage. Our source code is available for review on Github:

https://github.com/pokt-scan/soothe-vault

Our privacy policy and terms of use can be viewed at:

• Privacy Policy: https://trustsoothe.io/privacy-policy
• Terms of Use: https://trustsoothe.io/terms-of-use

For more details, visit Soothe Vault: https://trustsoothe.io
